author: Upper Echelon
description:
Go to https://ground.news/echelon to see all sides of every story. Subscribe through my link to get 40% off unlimited access this month only. 


As AI rapidly expands into every sector of business and everyday life, the number of potential problems is growing exponentially. However... in a world where these programs are unfortunately used as a therapy alternative by millions of people, we are faced with a question about how to proceed down that road.

Todays video is an examination of a New York Times article, which makes the case that some sort of Mandatory Reporting (or similar systems to what exist in traditional therapy) should be considered... which depending on implementation, would effectively mean that chatGPT, could send the police to your home. 

AI therapy should be shut down... not given extended permissions and power. 



THE RESEARCH PAPER: https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.02306

title: Trojan Horse Ethics - The New AI Danger
